actions.text: Amendment SA 1410 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1410 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 1386. (consideration: CR S10080, S10104-10105, S10115-10116) To reinstate congressional review of corporate average fuel economy standards for passenger vehicles.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1410 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1410 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 1386.

amends_amendment.purpose: To impose additional requirements for improving automobile fuel economy and reducing vehicle emissions.

purpose: To reinstate congressional review of corporate average fuel economy standards for passenger vehicles.
